channel.title: Rapid-Pkz (New) || Bounty Hunter Cratorsr || Oldschool 317 loading 508 || Alot m
channel.description:
[SIZE=5][U]This thread will be updated shortly[/U]
Hello everyone this is my new server Rapid-Pkz, i used to run one of the biggest servers back in the day and now i'm back trying out my new project "Rapid-Pkz", alot of things are planned and some really great developers will be joining in shortly, it's fairly new so wait for it to grow & wait for content to be added we also need ideas for what to be added, I'll be getting a sponsors/website shortly and the player count will go up like crazy, join now and help suggest new content to be added and be active and maybe you can become a staff member, we are going to run this for quite awhile so stick around we are not going anywhere.
___Current Features added___ - Full Bounty Hunter (Low/Med/High Crators, Scoreboards (Even load if the player is offline), Targets, Teleport to target, proper maps)
- 317 loading 508 cache HD - Beautiful barrage orbs when player is frozen - Includes flawless combat - 5 minigames & alot more coming - Shitload more!
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/3ag85kta2xk8hvq/Rapid-Pkz.jar?dl=1&token_hash=AAH4Lq1whvTL0AvMgx7h0-XDXO06o3SVAbZZN2pWSbP47A]Download Client ( Mac Capabilities )[/url]
[CENTER]___Images___[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/16a7jpc.jpg[/img] IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/unbcw.png[/IMG] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/flk29s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/350q5ht.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/15e92te.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/35iyql4.png[/img] [/CENTER]

[SIZE=5][U]This thread will be updated shortly[/U]

Hello everyone this is my new server Rapid-Pkz, i used to run one of the biggest servers back in the day and now i’m back trying out my new project “Rapid-Pkz”, alot of things are planned and some really great developers will be joining in shortly, it’s fairly new so wait for it to grow & wait for content to be added we also need ideas for what to be added, I’ll be getting a sponsors/website shortly and the player count will go up like crazy, join now and help suggest new content to be added and be active and maybe you can become a staff member, we are going to run this for quite awhile so stick around we are not going anywhere.

Current Features added

  • Full Bounty Hunter (Low/Med/High Crators, Scoreboards (Even load if the player is offline), Targets, Teleport to target, proper maps)

  • 317 loading 508 cache HD

Shitload more!
